files.content:
package org.ufes.inf.test.test1;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
dialect "mvel"
declare Plate
	id: Integer
	name: String
end
declare Car
	id: Integer
	name: String
end
rule "Car"
	when
		$c: Car()
	then
		System.out.println($c + " is a car.");
end

files.name: rules2.drl
files.content:
package org.ufes.inf.test.test2;
import org.ufes.inf.test.test1.*;
import java.util.ArrayList;
dialect "mvel"
declare Person extends Actor
	id: Integer
	name: String
	temperature: Float
	cars: ArrayList @type(Car)
end
rule "Fever"
	when
		$p: Person(temperature > 37)
	then
		System.out.println($p + " is running a fever.");
end
rule "Person has car"
	when
		$c: Car(name == "Higor's Car")
		$p: Person(cars contains $c)
	then
		System.out.println($p + " has " + $c);
end
